text: yeml aljini lisulayman ma yasha' min masajid llebadt, wasuar min nhas wzjaj, wqisae kabirat kalahwad alty yajtamie fiha alma', waqudur thabtat la tataharak min amaknha lezmhn, waqulna ya al dawd: aemaluu shkrana lilah ealaa ma aetakm, wdhlk btaeth wamtthal amrh, waqalil min eibadi min yashkur allah kthyrana, wakan dawud walh min alqlyl
